headline: Northern Trust Declares Quarterly Dividends on Common and Preferred Stock
summary: CHICAGO, April 22, 2025--Northern Trust Corporation (Nasdaq: NTRS), holding company of The Northern Trust Company, has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.75 per share on its common stock ($1.66-2/3 par value), payable on July 1, 2025, to holders of record at 5:00 p.m., Chicago time, on June 6, 2025.

headline: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) Sees Surge In Q1 Earnings and Net Interest Income
summary: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) reported robust financials for Q1 2025, including notable increases in net income and earnings per share. Despite these strong results, the company's stock saw a decline of 3.4% over the past week, contrasting with broader market trends which saw a 4.4% overall drop. This price movement could be influenced by wider market volatility, as major indices rebounded sharply, with the Dow rising over 1,000 points. While Northern Trust's positive earnings news might...

headline: Northern Trust quarterly profit rises amid higher fee income
summary: Economic uncertainty sparked by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff announcements has contributed to market volatility, prompting investors to swiftly rebalance their portfolios in an effort to shield against potential losses.  Fees earned from managing and servicing client assets are the biggest source of revenue for Northern Trust.  It provides wealth management, asset management and banking services to institutions, affluent families and individuals.

headline: Northern Trust Corporation (NTRS) Q1 Earnings Beat Estimates
summary: Northern Trust (NTRS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 2.70% and 0.34%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Northern Trust Corporation Reports First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: CHICAGO, April 22, 2025--Northern Trust Corporation has released its first quarter 2025 financial results. Results can be found at https://www.northerntrust.com/about-us/investor-relations as well as on the corporation's Current Report on Form 8-K filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on April 22, 2025, which is available on the SEC's website at https://www.sec.gov.

headline: Northern Trust Names Douglas Gee to Lead Global Sales for Asset Servicing
summary: CHICAGO & LONDON, April 22, 2025--Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) announced today that Douglas Gee has been named Global Head of Sales for Asset Servicing, effective 1 July. He replaces the retiring Jon Dunham.
